item.description:
CfJJ on the Run is a 5k race that will raise awareness of and support for some of the most vulnerable children in Massachusetts: those who get in trouble with the law. 
This is a chipped and timed race. Children under 10 are free. Strollers are welcome. Please plan to start near the end of the line to reduce crowding and allow runners to achieve their best time. For the safety of runners and walkers, please leave your family pets at home.
To register: http://www.active.com/running/boston-ma/cfjj-on-the-run-2011

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: 5K walk/run for charity!
